biotools.summary: Omics Pilot Platform of Ontology (oppOntology) is a kind of enrichment analysis tool for omics data with a graphical user interface (GUI), founded on the architecture of MATLAB AppDesigner. oppOntology supports the enrichment calculation of GO (Gene Ontology), KEGG (Kyoto Encyclopedia of Genes and Genomes), HPO (Human Phenotype Ontology), COG (Clusters of Orthologous Groups), MsigDB (Molecular Signatures Database) and Function (custom functions).

bioschemas.name: oppOntology
